sqlMap.select: SELECT BANK_ID as bankId , BANK_NM as bankNm , ACCOUNT as account , RIPPLE_TRADE as rippleTrade FROM RIPPLE_ACCOUNT_INFO
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RIPPLE_ACCOUNT_INFO SET BANK_ID = #bankId# , BANK_NM = #bankNm# , ACCOUNT = #account# , RIPPLE_TRADE = #rippleTrade# WHERE ID = 1
sqlMap.select: SELECT IFNULL(MIN(REQUEST_MONEY),0) AS LOWVOLUME FROM RIPPLE_ADMIN_XRP_TRADE WHERE REQUEST_DT = ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') )
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(REQUEST_MONEY),0) AS HIGHVOLUME FROM RIPPLE_ADMIN_XRP_TRADE WHERE REQUEST_DT = ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') )
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(REQUEST_MONEY),0) AS ASKSVOLUME FROM RIPPLE_ADMIN_XRP_TRADE WHERE REQUEST_DT = ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') ) AND TRADE_TYPE='B'
SELECT IFNULL(MIN(REQUEST_MONEY),0) AS BIDSVOLUME FROM RIPPLE_ADMIN_XRP_TRADE WHERE REQUEST_DT = ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') ) AND TRADE_TYPE='S'

SELECT IFNULL( SELECT MIN(REQUEST_MONEY) AS LOWVOLUME FROM RIPPLE_ADMIN_XRP_TRADE WHERE TRADE_TYPE='S' AND REQUEST_DT = ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') ) ) - (SELECT MAX(REQUEST_MONEY) AS HIGHVOLUME FROM RIPPLE_ADMIN_XRP_TRADE WHERE TRADE_TYPE='B' AND REQUEST_DT = ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') ) ),0) AS SPREADSVOLUME

SELECT IFNULL(REQUEST_MONEY,0) AS closeVolume FROM RIPPLE_ADMIN_XRP_TRADE WHERE TRADE_ID = ( SELECT MAX(TRADE_ID) FROM RIPPLE_ADMIN_XRP_TRADE WHERE TRADE_TYPE = 'C' AND REQUEST_DT = ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') ) )

SELECT IFNULL(REQUEST_MONEY, 0) AS beforeCloseVolume FROM RIPPLE_ADMIN_XRP_TRADE WHERE TRADE_ID = ( SELECT MAX(TRADE_ID) FROM RIPPLE_ADMIN_XRP_TRADE WHERE TRADE_TYPE = 'C' AND REQUEST_DT = ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y%m%d') ) )

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(RESULT_TOT_MONEY), 0) AS counterVolume , IFNULL(SUM(REQUEST_QTY),0) AS baseVolume FROM RIPPLE_TRADE WHERE TRADE_TYPE IN ('B', 'S') AND DATE_FORMAT(REQUEST_DT, '%Y%m%d') = ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') )

SELECT REQUEST_MONEY AS closeVolume , STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT( REQUEST_DT, REQUEST_TIME),'%Y%m%d%k%i') AS startTime FROM RIPPLE_ADMIN_XRP_TRADE WHERE TRADE_TYPE = 'C'
AND REQUEST_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
AND REQUEST_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -6 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
AND REQUEST_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 month), '%Y%m%d')
AND REQUEST_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR), '%Y%m%d')
ORDER BY TRADE_ID

SELECT REQUEST_MONEY AS closeVolume , STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT( REQUEST_DT, REQUEST_TIME),'%Y%m%d%k%i') AS startTime FROM RIPPLE_ADMIN_XRP_TRADE WHERE TRADE_TYPE = 'C' AND REQUEST_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY TRADE_ID
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNGNRLMBER SET ATCHFILEID = #atchFileId# , ATCHFILEID1 = #atchFileId1# , ATCHFILEID2 = #atchFileId2# , ATCHFILEID3 = #atchFileId3# WHERE MBER_ID=#mberId#
